answers.answer: The flu  made me sick as well my doc told me I could take Tylenol products and that was about it. I got it Mon and been sick since
I was always told it wasn't necessary. I just wanted to play it safe and this is where it got me -_-.. I wouldn't recommend it because I feel horrible

The flu shot is not nessercery, they recommend it because your immune system is supposed to be lower. But it's only the flu, not really a big deal! I don't think it's worth it! Most ppl get a fever a day later anyways... which is not good pregnant ether.
My temp has raised to 103.1 . If it raises after meds my ob office want me to go to the hospital. :(
You CANNOT get the flu from the flu shot. First of all you are not injected with a live virus. Fever and soreness is a side effect of the shot.

If fever is a side affect then obviously you can get sick from it. Nothin is healthy about a 9 month pregnant woman with a temp of 103. High temps can cause I blood pressure and high blood pressure can cause preeclampsia
If you read my post I said she cant get the flu not that she couldnt get sick. Everything has side effects which is why you should alwsys do your research before hand.

My doctor told me to get the shot because it travels down to my baby. But I was sick too abd she told me it's just my body building antibodies against the flu and to not take Tylenol unless it lasts for more than a few days because it'll interfere. But you might wanna talk to your doctor.

question: Yesterday I went to the doctor and the gave me a flu shot about 6 hrs later I had a temp of 102.3 . I couldn't even  move. What should I do
title: flu shot and 38 weeks pregnant
